title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 25
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 25
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his Chart of the Day "Einhorn, value-investing peers suffer years of hurt." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.\u0010\u0010Craig Giammona\u0010Consumer Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing the list of reasons behind Chipotle's terrible quarter.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
